title: Brand New Luxury!!! PET OK, Coolidge Corner, Concierge, Gym, avail
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 97019127', 'Rent: $3,000 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 10/01/2022', 'Pet: Cats & Small Dogs Only', 'Parking:: attached garage', "Brand new luxury apartment right in the heart of Brookline's Coolidge Corner.", 'New Construction due to be complete in August of 2016.', 'All units boast Caesarstone counter tops, hardwood floors, in unit laundry.', 'This building has it all!!!', 'Concierge and gym.', 'Balconies in select units.', 'Steps to Longwood, and Coolidge Corner T stop and all the shops and restaurants that Coolidge Corner has to offer.', 'FEATURES', 'Central Air Conditioning', 'Central Heat', 'Ceramic Tiles', 'Deleaded', 'Gas Heat', 'High Efficient Gas Heat', 'No Smoking Building', 'Stainless Steel Appliance(s)', 'Call or Text Michela Nionakis at 617-939-7425 for an immediate response!', 'Encore Realty', 'Share your search criteria with me here:', '<URL>', 'The information in this listing may have been gathered from third party sources including the owner and public records.', 'Listings are subject to errors and omissions.', 'Encore Realty disclaims any and all representations or warranties as to the accuracy of this information.', 'Encore Realty is an Equal Housing Opportunity Agency.', 'Photos may not always be of the actual apartment, at times sample images are used to make a general representation.']
